form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Form G-135, United States Department of Justice, Immigration and Naturalization Service

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Form G-135 Agency Name Check OCT 3 1956 Rev. 8-9-55 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE District Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. NEW YORK 0300- A-10294862 H Sub-Office Date 9-25-56 Indexed DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, by Index Unit, NY DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE 10/23/56 Washington 25, D.C. Date Initials Attention: INVESTIGATIVE DIVISION Please furnish any derogatory information contained in any file - other than fingerprint records - which your Bureau may have concerning the following person: NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL 1908 STATUS M Y MAR DOO PLACE OF BIRTH (City, Province or PRESENT NATION- S M CHINA state & country) ALITY LUNG DENG, TOY SHAN, KWANTGUNG CHINA D W ALIASES (Identify maiden names or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (Include present address, if known) MA GWOON GOON, DEC MAR/AU SANG WONG SHEE, DEC HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS 5-6 140 orn blk yellow mole over rt eyebrow; RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc. (City, state and country) FROM TO Soon Hing Farm, Green Lawn, LI, NY 9-10-56 date 665 E 156 St., Bronx, NY 4/56 9/56 831 E 153 St., Bronx, NY 1/56 4/56 EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO Soon Hing Farm, Green Lawn, LI, NY laborer 9-10-56 date Ying Lee Shirt Pressing, Jamaica, LI, NY presser 4/56 9/56 PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) crowman SPOUSE (Full name & other names used, & present address, If not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH age 46 Worg Lai Yung, Toyshan, China PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state & country) Toyshan, Kwan China ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports) 4-30-55 Bonston, Mass. crowman No Investigation Conducted by FBT PREVIOUS NUMBERS ASSIGNED (Milit, S/N; passport, social security; Pertinent to your inquiry.
